SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI

Class InspectedCardInfo

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.InspectedCardInfo
public class InspectedCardInfo extends Object
This class is used to store information about an inspected card in the game. It includes details such as the side of the card, the type of the card, the position of the card, etc.
